!Magister Dieter: This vision came to me from the key you gave me. "You were being watched by the thieves before you even stole the scripture. Because it was so long ago I was not able to distinguish much about them. There were 4 shadows. One of them was definitely a Dwarf, obvious from the short shadow. The other 3 were more difficult to distinguish. It was a moonless night. I saw them open the box and steal the scripture shortly after you left it there. They left hurriedly, in a northerly direction." I don't remember anything after this. I think there may be more secrets locked in my memory.
